content: 1 i smell snow everything s magical when it snows everything looks pretty the clothes are great coats scarves gloves hats lorelai gilmore / gilmore girls these gilmore girls inspired lace socks are super easy & super simple they re great for a first time toe-up knitter or a first time lace knitter and they also make the best last-minute gift with their amazingly quick-to- learn lace pattern note that the pattern is written for double-point needles but you can most definitely use circular needles if you prefer don t forget to turn on gilmore girls before you start knitting size women s medium 64 sts gauge 9 sts and 12 row = 1 in stockinette stitch materials 1 skein of fingering weight 400m/437 yards per 100g sock yarn i used inaya creations glitter sock yarn 75/20/5 merino/nylon/stellina double-point needles or circular needles if you prefer 2 stitch markers tapestry needle judy s magic cast on http //www knitty com/issuespring06/featmagiccaston html more info on fleegle heel http //fleeglesblog blogspot fi/2006/11/leegles-toe-up-no-flap-no-hassle- sock html elizabeth zimmermann s sewn bind off http //www knitty com/issuesummer06/featsum06tt html © sanni koivumäki 2016 2 abbreviations k = knit p = purl m1r = make 1 right lift strand between stitches onto the left needle from the back knit through the front loop m1l = make 1 left lift strand between stitches onto the left needle from the front knit through the back loop k2tog = knit 2 together ssk = slip slip knit slip 1 stitch knitwise slip another stitch knitwise knit these stitches together through the back loop yo = yarn over sl1-k2tog-psso = slip 1 knitwise knit 2 together pass slipped stitch over sl1k = slip 1 knitwise sl1p = slip 1 purlwise p2togtbl = purl 2 together through back loop ktbl = knit through back loop © sanni koivumäki 2016 3 toe cast on 20 stitches using judy s magic cast on set-up row knit 10 stitches knit 10 stitches through back loop row 1 k1 m1r knit to 1 stitch before end of second needle m1l k2 m1r knit to 1 stitch before end of row m1l k1 row 2 knit all stitches repeat row 1-2 until you have a total of 64 stitches foot row 1-8 work left sock chart or when making right sock right sock chart on stitches 1-32 needles 1-2 on dpn k to end needles 3-4 on dpn repeat row 1-8 until work measures 15 cm / 6 from beginning or 8 cm / 3 less than desired foot length gusset continue working chart on needles 1 and 2 for entire gusset set-up row for needles 3 and 4 m1r place marker k to end of needle 4 place marker m1l row 1 k to end row 2 k to first marker m1r slip marker k to second marker slip marker m1l k to end repeat row 1-2 until you have 62 stitches on needles 3 and 4 a total of 94 stitches fleegle heel rs set-up
